# Glossary

| Abbreviation              | Desciption  |
| --------------------------| ------------|
| LM                        | Linear model|
| GLM                       | Generalized linear model |
| ML                        | Machine Learning |
| RF                        | Random Forest |
| SVM                       | Support Vector Machines |
| SPVs                      | surrogate proportion variables |
| hrs                       | hours       |
| outcome                   | response variable, here: the percentage of reads that map to the pathogen |
|                           | Note: we use _outcome_ and _response_ variable interchangably here |
| _P._                        | _Plasmodium (genus)_ |
| M                         | Millions |
| eg                        | exempli gratia, for example |
